beer.beer_description:
This award-winning beer is the embodiment of the validity and integrity of the Holy Brewing Method our 9% abv been recognised receiving a gold medal from the 2015 Monde Selection Awards International Institute for Quality Selections

Kestrel Super Premium lager is now also available in an 8% variant

Appearance Honey-hued polished gold and ephemeral white foam create an intriguing spectacle

Aroma A perfumed sweetness and oaked spirit nose indicate something special to be discovered in this handsome liquid

Flavour Sweet toffee and honeyed twist turns and loops combine with a concentrated wine-like fruitiness feisty light rum swirls of malt and decidedly ripe dessert apple richness

Mouthfeel and finish Powerfully spirited and a juicy spice

items.checkin_comment:
500ml Dose. Goldenes Bier fast ohne Schaum. Sehr süsser malziger Duft mit deutlich uneingebundenem Alkohol. Geschmack ist süss, metallisch , malzig und alkoholisch.
Aroma (3)
Aussehen (3)
Flavor (3)
Mundgefühl (2)
Gesamt (6)

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 65 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 14! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 85 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 18!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 105 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 22!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 80 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 17! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 300 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 61!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 15 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 4!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 35 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 8.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 20 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.checkin_comment: Surprisingly crisp, clean, and refreshing, slightly sweet with malts upfront, slightly hoppy with citrus to finish, no massive alcohol burn....probably be a different story if it were warmer...quite a dangerous beer, especially at the price I paid.

user.bio: Behind the bar at the Alexandra Hotel Derby.
